pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenery shot from the perspective of a car driving down a city street at night. The view through the windshield shows the road ahead, illuminated by streetlights, traffic signals, and the lights of other vehicles. A large truck is visible on the right side of the road as the car moves forward.
